description: Consignment information for a movement (arrival, departure).

originLocation.description: The location of the origin of the consignment expressed as a scheme and id.

originPostalAddress.description: A structured, schema.org-style address for the origin location.

originOrganization.description: The organisational details of the origin, including any necessary identifiers.

destinationLocation.description: The location of the destination of the consignment expressed as a scheme and id.

destinationPostalAddress.description: A structured, schema.org-style address for the destination location.

destinationOrganization.description: The organisational details of the destination, including any necessary identifiers.

loadingDateTime.description: RFC3339 UTC date and time animals were loaded for transport (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

unloadingDateTime.description: RFC3339 UTC date and time animals were unloaded after transport (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

expectedDuration.description: Expected duration of transportation in hours.

transportOperator.description: Transport operator official name (should really be schema.org/organization).

vehicle.description: Identification of the vehicle (for example, licence plate).

isolationFacilityUsed.description: True if an isolation facility was used for the movement.

farmAssuranceReference.description: Identification reference of a farm assurance operation.

countConsigned.description: The number of animals despatched or consigned from the origin.

countReceived.description: The number of animals received at the destination.

hoursOffFeed.description: The number of hours since animals in the consignment had access to feed.

hoursOffWater.description: The number of hours since animals in the consignment had access to water.

references.description: References associated with the consignment. These may be additional to the single transport reference (for instance, to support multi-mode transport).

interestedParties.description: Identifies the parties and their interests in the consignment.

declarations.description: Country, species or scheme -specific declarations for the consignment.
